sections.heading: Overview
content:
Tamar Safra, MD, is an attending oncologist at the Tel Aviv Sourasky Medical
Center in Tel Aviv, Israel. She is in charge of the Oncology Gynecology Service
and treats patients diagnosed with gynecological and breast cancers. She also
serves on the faculty of the department of medicine of the Sackler School of
Medicine at Tel Aviv University.

Safra is a  graduate of the Hebrew University in Jerusalem and of Bar
Ilan University in Ramat Gan, Israel. She completed a specialty program in
medical oncology and radiotherapy at the Hadassah Medical School. This
specialty was then followed by three years as a faculty member of the
University of Southern California Norris Cancer Center in Los Angeles.
